original_text: And Barak called Zebulun and Naphtali to Kedesh; and he went up with ten thousand men at his feet: and Deborah went up with him.
korean_text: 바락이 스불론과 납달리를 게데스로 부르니 만 명이 그를 따라 올라가고 드보라도 그와 함께 올라가니라

sentences.original_text: And Barak called Zebulun and Naphtali to Kedesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바락은 스불론과 납달리를 그데스로 불렀고

sentences.original_text: and he went up with ten thousand men at his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 십만 명의 군사를 이끌고 올라갔으며

sentences.original_text: and Deborah went up with him
